{"id":417171754,"lang":"python3","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1604606882,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"32 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/417171754/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"14.2 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    \n    def myPow(self, x: float, n: int) -> float:\n        # O(logn) time | O(1) space\n        sign = -1 if n < 0 else 1\n        n = abs(n)\n        ans = 1\n        while n > 0:\n            if n % 2 == 1:\n                n -= 1\n                ans *= x\n            n //= 2\n            x *= x\n        if sign == -1:\n            ans = 1/ans\n        return ans","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
